short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReWordle provides Wordle insights through its light yet powerful guessing algorithm!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReWordle is a sophisticated Wordle algorithm that offers insights through a small and simple user interface. 

Without providing any spoilers on the landing page, you will see 3 descriptions of how close they are to solving the puzzle. 

1) The number of possible answers (targets) left
2) The number of unique letters left in the remaining targets
3) The average number you could narrow your choices to by using the algorithms best guess for your next guess

1a) If you click into the targets left display, you will see all the possible "Wordle" words that match the clues given by your current guesses.  You can click on a "Wordle" word to have it filled in for you. 

2a) If you click into the letters left display, you will see a chart of which letters remain and which occur most frequently in the remaining targets. 

3a) If you click into the best guess display, you will see a chart of the algorithm's best guess suggestions.  It's correlating number is the average number of words that would be left if the guess was played.  This can also be thought of as a "narrowing score". Lower is better. 

3b) The algorithm chart has options for normal mode, hard mode, and target words only. 

Even if you're not looking for insights, ReWordle helps satisfy those moments when you think "There has to be only one word in the world that this could be!"
